attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop being soft on criminals, burglars, rapists, gangs, druggies, asbo kids, tagged people. take them away. Teach them a harsh lesson , it's about time. Remove the intimidation they cause to others.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
